text: Yuzvendra Chahal is an Indian cricketer. He internationally plays for India national cricket team. And he is currently plays for Rajasthan Royals in the Indian Premier League. Chahal is a leg-spin bowler. He is mainly known for his bowling skills and he is a second player and first Indian who take a 6 wickets in T20I history. == Sources == Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers
title: Yuzvendra Chahal
